test-case.name: TC-18 Verify user can update number of guests on Homepage
test-case.title: TC-18 Verify user can update number of guests on Homepage

step.name: Given I am on hotels landing page
step.title: Given I am on hotels landing page

step.name: When I click on Travelers
step.title: When I click on Travelers

step.name: Then I select adults as "6"
step.title: Then I select adults as "6"

step.name: Then I select children as "3"
step.title: Then I select children as "3"

step.name: Then I select first child age as 4
step.title: Then I select first child age as 4

step.name: Then I select second child age under 1
step.title: Then I select second child age under 1

step.name: Then I select third child age 7
step.title: Then I select third child age 7

step.name: When I click Done
step.title: When I click Done

step.name: Then I verify total number of guests in sum of adults and children same as selected on step 3 and 4
step.title: Then I verify total number of guests in sum of adults and children same as selected on step 3 and 4
